attributes.action: Allow The royal princes to serve in conflict zones even in a rear headquarters role
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow The royal princes to serve in conflict zones even in a rear headquarters role. Disagree that the royal prince's are being banned from performing the duties expected of a British serviceman or woman. In essence how can it be expected of any other man or woman to serve the uk in a combat role to defend there nation if they are not.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Princes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
